Good for casual dabbling, if you try to get into it on a more regular basis, and with more than some friends, you'll find most of the community falls into one of two categories. One is the casual having fun types that don't often play, and the other being hardcore, shave off milliseconds to most optimally ruin your day.

Good shit, just don't take it too seriously and don't listen to anything a survivor (or killer) says in post lobby.

Get it twisted. Camp, tunnel, flick your flashlight, abuse unbreakable loops, do whatever you want that lets you have fun. God knows the other side is doing the same.

Make sure to finish it with a respectable "GGs" in the comments at the end and then watch them spiral out of control anyways.

Pro Tip: If you see 3+ flashlights just bring lightborn. Yes you can outplay it, but it makes you feel like a fucking king to slap them in the face as they try to clickyclicky you over a slammed pallet.

Ese juego está horrible, antes era bueno, dejaban escapar por la trampilla a varios jugadores si se reparaba cierto número de generadores, ahora ya no, debes ser el último en la partida, encima uno como jugador nuevo no es bueno como superviviente y siempre quieren mejorar las cosas para los asesinos dizque porque los supervivientes tienen "más ventajas", pero no tienen en cuenta que gran parte de los jugadores no jugamos comunicados, la mayoria de partidas lo matan a uno y cada vez el juego va de mal en peor ya dañaron fajador que es como una esperanza para esquivarle un golpe al asesino, de mi parte no lo vuelvo a jugar y como yo otras personas prefieren echar el juego a la basura porque siempre perder no es para nada divertido, enserio se pasan, sigan dañando su juego de mier... behaviour de mi no van a recibir un peso más.
if you want a game that is exciting and keeps you on the edge of your chair this is a good game for you.

When my buddy said that DBD would go into a collab with Attack on Titan, I was super hyped. I had even planned to buy all the skins they release, but when he said it was only cosplay-wise, the hype was gone again, but in my heart I hoped that they were original skins. When the update came and I saw this disgrace of skins, I felt nauseous, tears flowed from my eyes. as a real attack on titan fan i had to suffer at the sight. I barely tolerated all the Noed, Tunneller and camper noobs. But these skins made me remove the game from my storage first. In the end, this collab was death for me. Shinzou wo Sasageyo

This game used to be something I'd play constantly, both as killer and survivor, with friends or alone, on both steam and console. I would recommend it in a heartbeat back then as long as you weren't easy to tilt since the community gets kind of toxic.

Well, not anymore. 

The latest patch nerfed pretty much every survivor perk that was used to the ground and nowadays the game is an absolute stomp for any killer that didn't just start playing. Also, as if the survivor nerfs weren't bad enough, generators ALSO take longer to fix. There used to be wins, losses, middle ground games, nowadays it's always 4K wins for killers without survivors even powering up doors. Heck, with level 1 wraith I was able to 4K survivors before they got to their 4th generator. The game is incredibly frustrating for survivors as it is, and incredibly boring for killers.

To top it all, we have an amazing Attack on Titan collab ongoing, where the only free thing you get is this crappy charm, the rest is all paid skins. No new map, no new killer, survivor, free outfits, just nothing. You either open up your wallet for skins that look ridiculous (Eren with glasses LMAO) or be thankful you have this stupid charm. After Stranger Things collab I had high hopes for this but nah.

Don't bother with this garbage until they revert back all the stuff they did. Play VHS which is free and way better that this dumpster fire, right now.
BEST GAME
You're gonna hate it. Then you'll start to love it. But then you'll hate it again.
very fun game

The game used to be fun, you could win some, lose some, find funny people and have a laugh. Although after the latest balance patch I find myself getting more frustrated than having fun. The game is horribly unbalanced for the survivors since all perks to counter tunneling have been nerfed nearly to the point of not even being worth using, you need to play a very strict meta in order to even stand a chance against most killers and if you are a free to play player without buying characters or paying for dlc, well... you simply will not be able to get the meta builds. It's truly sad to see a game where I used to have so much fun with my friends, to a game that instead dosent makes us laugh anymore and instead makes us feel sad and frustrated.

Very well balanced and rounded game. Constant updates and new content keeps it feeling fresh and entertaining. I don't see development of this game being abandoned like so many others I've played. If you're looking for a strategic, play with friends, rage inducing, jump scare, thrill of a game then this is probably the one for you. Also, you can't beat the price point of 20$ for the amount of content you'll get and continue to get through updates.

Legit only play because gf. This is one of the most slow paced games I've ever played which is fine if it wasn't how every match will go. The fact the only game mode is Gen finding while a kid who learned how to hack his character runs around and skull f***ks you gets old fast. Also there's a lot of stuff in the game you will have to watch youtube videos to even learn how to do or what it does because game sometimes just doesn't tell you anything. Match ques can sometimes take 3-5 minutes. If it wasn't for a lot of the crossover Ip's I'm sure this game would be more dead than it actually is.  The game works for what it is and isn't a buggy mess but man this gameplay really is so mind numbing to play.

This game used to be fun. There were ways to counter being camped, even though there was a meta you could put your own fun spin on the build you play, and you could still manage to escape if you had a teammate sandbagging. This latest update changed that. You are punished for not playing the exact meta, even more so if you don't have it the "ideal" perks unlocked or maxed. Counters have been nerfed to the point of uselessness, and if a single teammate makes one mistake it's daylight for all of you.
The games use to be fun, long, and spooky. Now you're lucky if you get to play for more than 5 mins.
TLDR: This update effed the game, go give VHS a try

Used to be fun. Win some, lose some. GG. Now it is toxic and nearly impossible to win (or have fun - the most important part) as a survivor. This update has killed this game. I seriously advise not playing in its current state.

Use to love playing this game, but with every upcoming patch they buff the killers and nerf the survivors. Solo queuing is impossible. Having over powered killers ruined the game, also the perks that helped you survive in solo queue were nerfed to the ground and it's no longer playable. I have invested time into this game and it's clear the developers don't care about their player base.

the only thing i dislike is that the devs are catering more to the killers and making this game completely boring and unplayable for survivors. nerfing all of our perks but buffing all the perks that they have so we cant counter anything. its sad.
game sucks dick

Do i recommend this game?
Only if you like masochism then yea, its fun, especially when you sit everyday with chasity for a month, without taking it off while peeing and liking to clear everything with your tongue.
Only then its midly fun.
Oh, yes, the game. Uhm... some overcomplicated mechanics, need to remember what every perk does (around 150 at the moment of posting review) and grindy as heck. Good that Devs are making events, otherwise its grindy like Warframe or other Destiny.
So, do i recommend it? Not for people with anger issues, but yes.

However, it's becoming increasingly clear that not only is the game dying, but the devs no longer care about those playing solo survivor.
